Interface org.doit.muffin.ContentFilter

public interface ContentFilter
extends Filter, Runnable
Filter interface for content filtering.

Author:
Mark Boyns
See Also:
RequestFilter, ReplyFilter, Filter, InputObjectStream, OutputObjectStream

needsFiltration(Request, Reply)
Specify whether or not this filter is interested in filtering the content related to request and reply.
setInputObjectStream(InputObjectStream)
Set the input stream to be used.
setOutputObjectStream(OutputObjectStream)
Set the output stream to be used.

needsFiltration 
 public abstract boolean needsFiltration(Request request,
                                         Reply reply)
Specify whether or not this filter is interested in filtering the content related to request and reply.

Parameters:
request - the request
reply - the reply
setInputObjectStream 
 public abstract void setInputObjectStream(InputObjectStream in)
Set the input stream to be used.

Parameters:
in - the input stream
setOutputObjectStream 
 public abstract void setOutputObjectStream(OutputObjectStream out)
Set the output stream to be used.

Parameters:
out - the output stream
